I kno other people have posted threads like this, but i have felt really disconnected from the community and i just want to get to kno you guyw better! So tell me about ypurselves!
wont be able to reply for a while but will check tomorroa <3

title: Learning more about you guys

replies.body: My name is Josh. Playing Minecraft since 2011, Avicus since 2012. My original username was macissad, and overall I just want to chill. I honestly think worrying takes up too much time, so who needs it. I now refuse to play minecraft without ts and skype open, because I don't play minecraft without talking to people, and never will. I like getting to meet people and hearing their stories. The players here on Avicus are chill, so while you're here, try to experience everyone as much as you can.

replies.body: Called LightCraft, and I got mod which was easiest to work with because hacking wasn't really around. All we did was stop rude players, spammers, beggers, etc. It was really cool.
